WorkItem.Description:
Hi there,
Thank you for this wonderful piece of code. I have this strange bug : I want to put this value in a cell : "3/4" (witout the quotes). It's not a fraction in my mind, but it seems to be detected as a fraction when I try to insert it with this line of code :
```
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->setCellValueByColumnAndRow($i++, $line, "3/4");
```
I get this error :
```
A PHP Error was encountered
Severity: Warning
Message:  Division by zero
Filename: Style/NumberFormat.php
Line Number: 486
```
Thanks
WorkItem.Summary: Fraction style in cell cause "division by zero" error
